snippet: All the major indexes rose significantly after recent earnings reports surpassed analysts’ estimates.
abstract: Stock market returns to record levels after Morgan Stanley and other companies report better-than-expected earnings.
lead_paragraph: All the major indexes rose significantly after recent earnings reports surpassed analysts’ estimates.

headline.main: Buoyed by Earnings Reports, Market Sets New Records
headline.print_headline: Buoyed by Earnings Reports, Market Sets New Records
